snippet: Jon Niese allowed five runs in the first inning, and the Mets lost to the Indians, who are in the thick of the American League wild-card race.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Cleveland Indians beat New York Mets, 9-4; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese allowed five runs in the first inning, and the Mets lost to the Indians, who are in the thick of the American League wild-card race.

headline.main: Mets Factor Into Playoff Race, but It’s the American League’s
headline.print_headline: Mets Factor Into Playoff Race: The American League’s
